attributes.action: To get the National Health Service to fund more places for Dialectical behavioral therapy (DBT).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dialectical Behavioural Therapy (DBT) is a psychological method developed to treat persons with Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD). Currently the National Health Service only fund limited places at each Mental Health Outpatient centre that run this course. The course runs for 52 weeks so there is only one course each year at each centre. We the undersigned request more funding to allow more people with Borderline Personality Disorder to be allowed this treatment each year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
